name: Savings Account
description: A secure place to keep your savings.

name: Money Market Account
description: A high-interest account for large balances.

name: Certificate of Deposit
description: A fixed-term account with a fixed interest rate.

name: Individual Retirement Account
description: A tax-advantaged account for retirement savings.

name: 401(k) Account
description: A retirement account sponsored by an employer.

name: 529 College Savings Plan
description: A tax-advantaged account for college savings.

name: Health Savings Account
description: A tax-advantaged account for medical expenses.

name: Custodial Account
description: An account for minors managed by an adult.

name: Joint Account
description: An account shared by two or more people.

name: Trust Account
description: An account managed by a trustee for the benefit of another.

name: Brokerage Account
description: An account for buying and selling investments.

name: Money Transfer Account
description: An account for transferring money between accounts

name: Checking Account
description: An account for everyday transactions.

name: Credit Card Account
description: An account for making purchases on credit.

name: Loan Account
description: An account for borrowing money.

name: Mortgage Account
description: An account for financing a home purchase.

name: Auto Loan Account
description: An account for financing a vehicle purchase.

name: Personal Loan Account
description: An account for personal expenses.

name: Student Loan Account
description: An account for educational expenses.

name: Business Loan Account
description: An account for business expenses.
